00023 XNetworkAnalyzer::XNetworkAnalyzer(const char *name, bool runtime,
00024            const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00025            const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00026            const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00027            const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00028     XPrimaryDriver(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00029     m_marker1X(create<XScalarEntry>("Marker1X", false, 
00030                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00031     m_marker1Y(create<XScalarEntry>("Marker1Y", false, 
00032                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00033     m_marker2X(create<XScalarEntry>("Marker2X", false, 
00034                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00035     m_marker2Y(create<XScalarEntry>("Marker2Y", false, 
00036                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()))),
00037     m_startFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("StartFreq", false)),
00038     m_stopFreq(create<XDoubleNode>("StopFreq", false)),
00039     m_points(create<XComboNode>("Points", false, true)),
00040     m_average(create<XUIntNode>("Average", false)),
00041     m_form(new FrmNetworkAnalyzer(g_pFrmMain)),
00042     m_waveForm(create<XWaveNGraph>("WaveForm", false, 
00043                                    m_form->m_graphwidget, m_form->m_urlDump, m_form->m_btnDump))
00044 {
00045     scalarentries->insert(m_marker1X);
00046     scalarentries->insert(m_marker1Y);
00047     scalarentries->insert(m_marker2X);
00048     scalarentries->insert(m_marker2Y);
00049     
00050     startFreq()->setUIEnabled(false);
00051     stopFreq()->setUIEnabled(false);
00052     points()->setUIEnabled(false);
00053     average()->setUIEnabled(false);
00054     m_conStartFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(startFreq(), m_form->m_edStart);
00055     m_conStopFreq = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(stopFreq(), m_form->m_edStop);
00056     m_conPoints = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(points(), m_form->m_cmbPoints);
00057     m_conAverage = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(average(), m_form->m_edAverage);
00058     
00059     const char *labels[] = {"Freq [MHz]", "Level [dB]"};
00060     m_waveForm->setColCount(2, labels); 
00061     m_waveForm->insertPlot("Trace1", 0, 1);
00062     m_waveForm->clear(); 
00063 
00064     m_graph = m_waveForm->graph();
00065     m_graph->backGround()->value(QColor(0x0A, 0x05, 0x45).rgb());
00066     m_graph->titleColor()->value(clWhite);
00067     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = m_waveForm->axisx();
00068     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisy = m_waveForm->axisy();
00069     axisx->ticColor()->value(clWhite);
00070     axisx->labelColor()->value(clWhite);
00071     axisx->ticLabelColor()->value(clWhite);  
00072     axisy->ticColor()->value(clWhite);
00073     axisy->labelColor()->value(clWhite);
00074     axisy->ticLabelColor()->value(clWhite);
00075     axisy->autoScale()->value(false);
00076     axisy->maxValue()->value(13.0);
00077     axisy->minValue()->value(-70.0);
00078     m_waveForm->plot(0)->drawPoints()->value(false);
00079     m_waveForm->plot(0)->lineColor()->value(clGreen);
00080     m_waveForm->plot(0)->pointColor()->value(clGreen);
00081     shared_ptr<XXYPlot> plot = m_graph->plots()->create<XXYPlot>(
00082         "Markers", true, m_graph);
00083     m_markerPlot = plot;
00084     plot->label()->value(i18n("Markers"));
00085     plot->axisX()->value(axisx);
00086     plot->axisY()->value(axisy);
00087     plot->drawLines()->value(false);
00088     plot->drawBars()->value(true);
00089     plot->pointColor()->value(clRed);
00090     plot->barColor()->value(clRed);
00091     plot->intensity()->value(2.0);
00092     plot->clearPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00093     plot->maxCount()->setUIEnabled(false);
00094 }
00095 void
00096 XNetworkAnalyzer::showForms() {
00097 //! impliment form->show() here
00098     m_form->show();
00099     m_form->raise();
00100 }
00101 
00102 void
00103 XNetworkAnalyzer::start()
00104 {
00105     m_thread.reset(new XThread<XNetworkAnalyzer>(shared_from_this(), &XNetworkAnalyzer::execute));
00106     m_thread->resume();
00107   
00108     startFreq()->setUIEnabled(true);
00109     stopFreq()->setUIEnabled(true);
00110     points()->setUIEnabled(true);
00111     average()->setUIEnabled(true);
00112 }
00113 void
00114 XNetworkAnalyzer::stop()
00115 {   
00116     startFreq()->setUIEnabled(false);
00117     stopFreq()->setUIEnabled(false);
00118     points()->setUIEnabled(false);
00119     average()->setUIEnabled(false);
00120     
00121     if(m_thread) m_thread->terminate();
00122 //    m_thread->waitFor();
00123 //  thread must do interface()->close() at the end
00124 }
00125 
00126 void
00127 XNetworkAnalyzer::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00128 {
00129     unsigned int numtr = pop<unsigned int>();
00130     if(numtr != 1)
00131         return; 
00132     unsigned int nummk = pop<unsigned int>();
00133     m_markersRecorded.resize(nummk);
00134     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nummk; i++) {
00135         m_markersRecorded[i].first = pop<double>();
00136         m_markersRecorded[i].second = pop<double>();
00137     }
00138     if(nummk >= 1) {
00139         m_marker1X->value(m_markersRecorded[0].first);
00140         m_marker1Y->value(m_markersRecorded[0].second);
00141     }
00142     if(nummk >= 2) {
00143         m_marker2X->value(m_markersRecorded[1].first);
00144         m_marker2Y->value(m_markersRecorded[1].second);
00145     }
00146     convertRaw();
00147 }
00148 void
00149 XNetworkAnalyzer::visualize()
00150 {
00151 //  if(!time()) {
00152 //      m_waveForm->clear();
00153 //      return;
00154 //  }
00155     const unsigned int length = lengthRecorded();
00156     { XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_waveForm);
00157 
00158     m_markerPlot->clearAllPoints();
00159     m_markerPlot->maxCount()->value(m_markersRecorded.size());
00160     for(std::deque<std::pair<double, double> >::const_iterator it = m_markersRecorded.begin();
00161         it != m_markersRecorded.end(); it++) {
00162         m_markerPlot->addPoint(it->first, it->second);
00163     }
00164     
00165     m_waveForm->setRowCount(length);
00166     
00167     double *freqs = m_waveForm->cols(0);
00168     double fint = freqIntervalRecorded();
00169     double f = startFreqRecorded();
00170     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00171         *freqs++ = f;
00172         f += fint;
00173     }
00174         
00175     memcpy(m_waveForm->cols(1), traceRecorded(), length * sizeof(double));
00176     }
00177 }
00178 
00179 void *
00180 XNetworkAnalyzer::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00181 {
00182     m_lsnOnStartFreqChanged = startFreq()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00183         shared_from_this(), &XNetworkAnalyzer::onStartFreqChanged);
00184     m_lsnOnStopFreqChanged = stopFreq()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00185         shared_from_this(), &XNetworkAnalyzer::onStopFreqChanged);
00186     m_lsnOnPointsChanged = points()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00187         shared_from_this(), &XNetworkAnalyzer::onPointsChanged);
00188     m_lsnOnAverageChanged = average()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00189         shared_from_this(), &XNetworkAnalyzer::onAverageChanged);
00190 
00191     while(!terminated) {
00192         XTime time_awared = XTime::now();
00193         clearRaw();
00194         // try/catch exception of communication errors
00195         try {
00196             oneSweep();
00197         }
00198         catch (XDriver::XSkippedRecordError&) {
00199             continue;
00200         }
00201         catch (XKameError &e) {
00202             e.print(getLabel());
00203             continue;
00204         }
00205         push((unsigned int)1); //# of traces.
00206         double mx[8], my[8];
00207         unsigned int nummk = 0;
00208         try {
00209             for(;nummk < 8;nummk++) {
00210                 mx[nummk] = 0.0;
00211                 my[nummk] = 0.0;
00212                 getMarkerPos(nummk, mx[nummk], my[nummk]);
00213             }
00214         }
00215         catch (XDriver::XSkippedRecordError&) {
00216         }
00217         catch (XKameError &e) {
00218             e.print(getLabel());
00219             continue;
00220         }
00221         push((unsigned int)nummk); //# of markers.
00222         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < nummk; i++) {
00223             push(mx[i]);
00224             push(my[i]);            
00225         }
00226         try {
00227             acquireTrace(0);
00228         }
00229         catch (XDriver::XSkippedRecordError&) {
00230             continue;
00231         }
00232         catch (XKameError &e) {
00233             e.print(getLabel());
00234             continue;
00235         }
00236         finishWritingRaw(time_awared, XTime::now());
00237     }
00238     try {
00239         startContSweep();
00240     }
00241     catch (XKameError &e) {
00242         e.print(getLabel());
00243     }
00244     m_lsnOnStartFreqChanged.reset();
00245     m_lsnOnStopFreqChanged.reset();
00246     m_lsnOnPointsChanged.reset();
00247     m_lsnOnAverageChanged.reset();
00248     
00249     afterStop();
00250     return NULL;
00251 }
